title: Zed's Death Mark Indicator
body:
Can we make it a little bit more noticeable by making the color brighter or make the shuriken itself bigger?
http://i.imgur.com/d85p2zp.png
PROJECT:ZED's indicator is a prime example of a good one! It stands out because of the size of the shuriken and the color!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_KV_NEpilQ
